name: mute_turnOn
description: This function is used to turn on the mute function of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name of the SmartThings device that needs to be muted.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment of the SmartThings device that needs to be muted.

parameters.name: screenPosition
parameters.description: The predefined screen position of the SmartThings device that needs to be muted.
